Activity: Arrive at the office, log in to the computer, and check emails.
Review emails. Prioritize responses to any queries from @Clinlead-1, @ITPM-1, @DA-1, @EHRDEV-1 or @EHRDEV-2 regarding the cross-validation report or documentation.

Meet with @EHRDEV-1 and @EHRDEV-2 to discuss the implementation of automated validation rules within the EHR system. Discuss the types of errors identified during cross-validation and how to address them with automated rules. Topic: EHR System Validation Rule Implementation
Document the requirements for automated validation rules based on the meeting with the EHR developers. Clarify the logic and parameters for each rule.
Begin configuring automated validation rules within the EHR system (development/testing environment). Focus on rules related to demographic data and primary diagnoses.
Continue configuring automated validation rules, shifting focus to lab results and medication orders. Test each rule to ensure it flags potential errors as expected.
Document the configuration and testing of each automated validation rule. Include the rule logic, parameters, and test results.
Email @EHRDEV-1 and @EHRDEV-2 to schedule a joint testing session for the automated validation rules. Topic: Joint Testing Session for Automated Validation Rules
Prepare testing scenarios and data sets for the joint testing session. Focus on scenarios that will thoroughly exercise the automated validation rules.
Update the task progress in the project management system. Prepare for tomorrow's tasks.
